snippet: President Obama and his national security team are drawing attention to what they see as a growing threat to the American military: relatively inexpensive weapons to keep American forces at a distance, rather than defeat them outright.
abstract: President Obama and his national security team are drawing attention to what they see as a growing threat to the American military: relatively inexpensive weapons to keep American forces at a distance, rather than defeat them outright.

headline.main: U.S. Strategy Points to Threat of Cheap but Potent Weapons
